409: You speak an infinite deal of nothing.
410: It’s okay if you don’t like me. Not everyone has good taste.
411: Your brain has two parts—the 'left' and the 'right'. On the left side, there's nothing right. On the right side, there's nothing left.
412: It must be hard putting makeup on your two faces.
413: I didn’t know that answering a question was considered ‘talking back.’
414: If you don't like my opinion of you—improve yourself!
415: Whenever we hang out, I remember that God really does have a sense of humor.
416: If you ran like your mouth, you’d be in good shape.
417: I would ask you how old you are, but I know that you can't count that high.
419: You are so ugly that when you looked in the mirror, your reflection walked away.
420: There’s only one thing that keeps me from breaking you in half—I don’t want two of you around!
422: Jealousy is a disease. Get well soon!
423: If ignorance is bliss, you must be the happiest person on the planet.
424: If you spoke your mind, you’d be speechless.
425: I heard your parents took you to a dog show and you won.
426: Sorry for the mean, awful accurate things I said.
427: Maybe you should eat some makeup so you can be pretty on the inside too.
428: Are you afraid that zombies will eat your brain? Nah, you’ll be fine.
429: If everyone was like you, the human race would lose faith in the world.
430: When your mom dropped you off at school, she got apprehended by the authorities for littering.
431: I can explain it to you, but I can’t understand it for you.
432: Since narcissistic is such a big word for you, how about asshole? You know what an asshole is, right?
433: I’m sorry you got offended that one time you were treated the exact way you treat everyone all the time.
434: Me, jealous of you? Bless your delusional heart!
435: Oops, my bad. I could’ve sworn I was dealing with an adult.
436: If I were a bird, you’d be the first person I’d poop on.
437: Stupidity is not a crime, so you’re free to go.
438: I have neither the time nor the crayons to explain this to you.
439: I wasn’t born with enough middle fingers to let you know how I feel.
440: Please cancel my subscription to your issues.
441: Oh, I’m sorry. I didn’t realize my happiness makes you so miserable.
442: If you really want to know about mistakes, you should ask your parents.
443: The only thing I don’t like about you is that constant inhaling and exhaling habit you have.
444: Mind if I ask where the OFF button for your mouth is?
445: Here’s a tissue, you have a little piece of sh*t on your lips.
446: I hope you step on a LEGO.
447: I’m sorry I didn’t get that. I don’t speak bullsh*t.
448: It’s okay if you disagree with me. I can’t force you to be right.
449: I may be fat, but fat can be burned. Ugly, on the other hand, is much more difficult to fix.
450: If I wanted a b*tch, I would have purchased a dog.
451: Unless your name is Google, stop acting like you know everything!
452: You know what’s funny? Not you, so shut up!
453: I’d like to help you out. Which way did you come in?
454: Long story short, because you wouldn’t be able to follow with the long one.
456: Beauty is skin deep, but ugly is to the bone.
457: May you always step on a wet spot after putting on fresh socks.
458: May both sides of your pillow be uncomfortably warm.
459: There's only one problem with your face, I can see it.
460: I told my therapist about you.
461: Did your parents ever ask you to run away?
462: So if I typed ‘idiot’ into Google image search, would your picture come up?
463: I don’t know what your problem is, but I’m guessing it’s hard to pronounce.
464: I’d love to kill you with kindness, but all I have is this chainsaw.
465: Who ate your bowl of sunshine this morning, thundercloud?
466: I’m not arguing. I’m simply explaining why I’m right.
467: You have the right to remain silent because whatever you say will probably be stupid anyway.
468: Don't you love nature despite what it did to you?
469: I’m not insulting you. I’m describing you.
470: Calling you an idiot would be an insult to all stupid people in the world.
471: I’m busy, you’re ugly. Have a nice day.
472: I don’t know what makes you so stupid, but it really works.
473: Look at the time, it’s time for you to shut the f*ck up!
474: You are about to exceed the limits of my medication.
475: I can only please one person a day. Today isn’t your day. Tomorrow isn’t looking good either.
476: My alone time is meant for your safety.
477: I desire that we be better strangers.
478: In order to insult me, I must first value your opinion. Nice try though.
